question:

B) Mon. morning: Irving; Mon. afternoon: Olivia Tues. morning: Helen; Tues. afternoon: Kyle Wed. morning: Nina; Wed. afternoon: Lenore
C) Mon. morning: Lenore; Mon. afternoon: Helen Tues. morning: George; Tues. afternoon: Kyle Wed. morning: Robert; Wed. afternoon: Irving
D) Mon. morning: Nina; Mon. afternoon: Helen Tues. morning: Robert; Tues. afternoon: Irving Wed. morning: Olivia; Wed. afternoon: Lenore
E) Mon. morning: Olivia; Mon. afternoon: Nina Tues. morning: Irving; Tues. afternoon: Helen Wed. morning: Kyle; Wed. afternoon: George
chain_of_thought: George can only give a report on Tuesday.  Olivia and Robert cannot give afternoon reports. If Nina gives a report, then Helen and Irving must give reports.  We need to figure out the order for the rest of the students.
full_output:
<think>George can only give a report on Tuesday.  Olivia and Robert cannot give afternoon reports. If Nina gives a report, then Helen and Irving must give reports.  We need to figure out the order for the rest of the students.</think>
<ans>B</ans>
